verses.verse: כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַמִּצְוָ֗ה <WH4687> All the commandments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֧י <WH595> I am מְצַוְּךָ֛ <WH6680> which I command הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> thee this day תִּשְׁמְר֣וּן <WH8104> shall ye observe לַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <WH6213> to do לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> that תִּֽחְי֜וּן <WH2421> that ye may live וּרְבִיתֶ֗ם <WH7235> and multiply וּבָאתֶם֙ <WH935> and go in וִֽירִשְׁתֶּ֣ם <WH3423> and possess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <WH7650> sware יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> unto your fathers

וְזָכַרְתָּ֣ <WH2142> And thou shalt remember אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדֶּ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> all the way אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הֹלִֽיכֲךָ֜ <WH1980> has led יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> thy God זֶ֛ה <WH2088> these אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> thee these forty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> in the wilderness לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> might עַנֹּֽתְךָ֜ <WH6031> to humble לְנַסֹּֽתְךָ֗ <WH5254> thee [and] to prove לָדַ֜עַת <WH3045> thee to know אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> what בִּֽלְבָבְךָ֛ <WH3824> what [was] in thine heart הֲתִשְׁמֹ֥ר <WH8104> whether thou wouldest keep [מִצְוֹתֹו כ] (מִצְוֹתָ֖יו <WH4687> commanded ק) אִם־ <WH518> or לֹֽא׃ <WH3808> not

וַֽיְעַנְּךָ֮ <WH6031> And he humbled וַיַּרְעִבֶךָ֒ <WH7456> thee and suffered thee to hunger וַיַּֽאֲכִֽלְךָ֤ <WH398> and fed אֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּן֙ <WH4478> thee with manna אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> nor יָדַ֔עְתָּ <WH3045> which thou knewest וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יָדְע֖וּן <WH3045> know אֲבֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH1> not neither did thy fathers לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> because of הוֹדִֽעֲךָ֗ <WH3045> that he might make thee know כִּ֠י <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor עַל־ <WH5921> by הַלֶּ֤חֶם <WH3899> by bread לְבַדּוֹ֙ <WH905> only יִחְיֶ֣ה <WH2421> doth not live הָֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> that man כִּ֛י <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> by כָּל־ <WH3605> everything מוֹצָ֥א <WH4161> but by every [word] that proceedeth פִֽי־ <WH6310> out of the mouth יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD יִחְיֶ֥ה <WH2421> live הָאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> doth man

שִׂמְלָ֨תְךָ֜ <WH8071> Thy raiment לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor בָֽלְתָה֙ <WH1086> waxed not old מֵֽעָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> and וְרַגְלְךָ֖ <WH7272> upon thee neither did thy foot לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor בָצֵ֑קָה <WH1216> swell זֶ֖ה <WH2088> these אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> these forty שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

וְיָדַעְתָּ֖ <WH3045> Thou shalt also consider עִם־ <WH5973> in לְבָבֶ֑ךָ <WH3824> thine heart כִּ֗י <WH3588> for כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יְיַסֵּ֥ר <WH3256> chasteneth אִישׁ֙ <WH376> that as a man אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [so] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God מְיַסְּרֶֽךָּ׃ <WH3256> chasteneth

וְשָׁ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <WH8104> Therefore thou shalt keep אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְוֹ֖ת <WH4687> the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God לָלֶ֥כֶת <WH1980> to walk בִּדְרָכָ֖יו <WH1870> in his ways וּלְיִרְאָ֥ה <WH3372> and to fear אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

כִּ֚י <WH3588> For יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God מְבִֽיאֲךָ֖ <WH935> bringeth אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> land טוֹבָ֑ה <WH2896> thee into a good אֶ֚רֶץ <WH776> a land נַ֣חֲלֵי <WH5158> of brooks מָ֔יִם <WH4325> of water עֲיָנֹת֙ <WH5869> of fountains וּתְהֹמֹ֔ת <WH8415> and depths יֹצְאִ֥ים <WH3318> that spring out בַּבִּקְעָ֖ה <WH1237> of valleys וּבָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> and hills

אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> A land חִטָּה֙ <WH2406> of wheat וּשְׂעֹרָ֔ה <WH8184> and barley וְגֶ֥פֶן <WH1612> and vines וּתְאֵנָ֖ה <WH8384> and fig trees וְרִמּ֑וֹן <WH7416> and pomegranates אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> a land זֵ֥ית <WH2132> olive שֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> of oil וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <WH1706> and honey

אֶ֗רֶץ <WH776> A land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> wherein לֹ֤א <WH3808> without בְמִסְכֵּנֻת֙ <WH4544> scarceness תֹּֽאכַל־ <WH398> thou shalt eat בָּ֣הּ לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> bread לֹֽא־ <WH3808> without תֶחְסַ֥ר <WH2637> thou shalt not lack כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> anything בָּ֑הּ אֶ֚רֶץ <WH776> any [thing] in it a land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whose אֲבָנֶ֣יהָ <WH68> whose stones בַרְזֶ֔ל <WH1270> [are] iron וּמֵהֲרָרֶ֖יהָ <WH2042> and out of whose hills תַּחְצֹ֥ב <WH2672> thou mayest dig נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> brass

וְאָכַלְתָּ֖ <WH398> When thou hast eaten וְשָׂבָ֑עְתָּ <WH7646> and art full וּבֵֽרַכְתָּ֙ <WH1288> then thou shalt bless אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God עַל־ <WH5921> and הָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> land הַטֹּבָ֖ה <WH2896> for the good אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָֽתַן־ <WH5414> which he hath given לָֽךְ׃

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <WH8104> Beware לְךָ֔ פֶּן־ <WH6435> not תִּשְׁכַּ֖ח <WH7911> that thou forget אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> not the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God לְבִלְתִּ֨י <WH1115> not שְׁמֹ֤ר <WH8104> in not keeping מִצְוֹתָיו֙ <WH4687> his commandments וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֣יו <WH4941> and his judgments וְחֻקֹּתָ֔יו <WH2708> and his statutes אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> which I command הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> thee this day

פֶּן־ <WH6435> otherwise תֹּאכַ֖ל <WH398> Lest [when] thou hast eaten וְשָׂבָ֑עְתָּ <WH7646> and art full וּבָתִּ֥ים <WH1004> houses טוֹבִ֛ים <WH2896> goodly תִּבְנֶ֖ה <WH1129> and hast built וְיָשָֽׁבְתָּ׃ <WH3427> and dwelt

וּבְקָֽרְךָ֤ <WH1241> And [when] thy herds וְצֹֽאנְךָ֙ <WH6629> and thy flocks יִרְבְּיֻ֔ן <WH7235> multiply וְכֶ֥סֶף <WH3701> and thy silver וְזָהָ֖ב <WH2091> and thy gold יִרְבֶּה־ <WH7235> is multiplied לָּ֑ךְ וְכֹ֥ל <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לְךָ֖ יִרְבֶּֽה׃ <WH7235> and all that thou hast is multiplied

וְרָ֖ם <WH7311> be lifted up לְבָבֶ֑ךָ <WH3824> Then thine heart וְשָֽׁכַחְתָּ֙ <WH7911> and thou forget אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God הַמּוֹצִיאֲךָ֛ <WH3318> which brought thee forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> from the house עֲבָדִֽים׃ <WH5650> of bondage

הַמּוֹלִ֨יכֲךָ֜ <WH1980> led בַּמִּדְבָּ֣ר ׀ <WH4057> wilderness הַגָּדֹ֣ל <WH1419> thee through that great וְהַנּוֹרָ֗א <WH3372> and terrible נָחָ֤שׁ ׀ <WH5175> serpents שָׂרָף֙ <WH8314> [wherein were] fiery וְעַקְרָ֔ב <WH6137> and scorpions וְצִמָּא֖וֹן <WH6774> and drought אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> where אֵֽין־ <WH369> there מָ֑יִם <WH4325> where [there was] no water הַמּוֹצִ֤יא <WH3318> who brought thee forth לְךָ֙ מַ֔יִם <WH4325> water מִצּ֖וּר <WH6697> out of the rock הַֽחַלָּמִֽישׁ׃ <WH2496> of flint

הַמַּֽאֲכִ֨לְךָ֥ <WH398> Who fed מָן֙ <WH4478> with manna בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> thee in the wilderness אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> did not יָדְע֖וּן <WH3045> knew אֲבֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH1> which thy fathers לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> might עַנֹּֽתְךָ֗ <WH6031> not that he might humble וּלְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> might נַסֹּתֶ֔ךָ <WH5254> thee and that he might prove לְהֵיטִֽבְךָ֖ <WH3190> thee to do thee good בְּאַחֲרִיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH319> at thy latter end

וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> And thou say בִּלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <WH3824> in thine heart כֹּחִי֙ <WH3581> My power וְעֹ֣צֶם <WH6108> and the might יָדִ֔י <WH3027> of [mine] hand עָ֥שָׂה <WH6213> hath gotten לִ֖י אֶת־ <WH853> הַחַ֥יִל <WH2428> me this wealth הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וְזָֽכַרְתָּ֙ <WH2142> But thou shalt remember אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ה֗וּא <WH1931> who הַנֹּתֵ֥ן <WH5414> for [it is] he that giveth לְךָ֛ כֹּ֖חַ <WH3581> thee power לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to get חָ֑יִל <WH2428> wealth לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> because of הָקִ֧ים <WH6965> that he may establish אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִית֛וֹ <WH1285> his covenant אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <WH7650> which he sware לַאֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH1> unto thy fathers כַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this פ

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> shall come אִם־ <WH518> if שָׁכֹ֤חַ <WH7911> And it shall be if thou do at all תִּשְׁכַּח֙ <WH7911> forget אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God וְהָֽלַכְתָּ֗ <WH1980> and walk אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> other וַעֲבַדְתָּ֖ם <WH5647> and serve וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִ֣יתָ <WH7812> them and worship לָהֶ֑ם הַעִדֹ֤תִי <WH5749> them I testify בָכֶם֙ הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> against you this day כִּ֥י <WH3588> that אָבֹ֖ד <WH6> that ye shall surely תֹּאבֵדֽוּן׃ <WH6> perish

כַּגּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> As the nations אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> that יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> which the LORD מַאֲבִ֣יד <WH6> destroyeth מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> before your face כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> so תֹאבֵד֑וּן <WH6> so shall ye perish עֵ֚קֶב <WH6118> because לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִשְׁמְע֔וּן <WH8085> ye would not be obedient בְּק֖וֹל <WH6963> unto the voice יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God פ
